overview_of_class: The goal of this course is to teach students the elements of high performance building design and to explore the various metrics used to analyze the relationship between the structure and function of various design alternatives.
name: Special Topics in Civil and Environmental Engrg
title: MEAS CIV_ENV 395-0-26 Special Topics in Civil and Environmental Engrg

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The goal of this course is to teach students the elements of high performance building design and to explore the various metrics used to analyze the relationship between the structure and function of various design alternatives.
